comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/anmm_thecommons/] Thank you for posting these 'Niagara' photos! Known as the "Titanic of the Pacific" for a very short while. She sank with a secret cargo of gold (UK paying USA for munitions) and the salvage operation was the subject of three books. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/RMS_Niagara www.deepquest.co.nz/book.htm
